thread.title: Move Over, Kim K! Tokyo’s Littlest Off-White Fanatic Takes Stellar Selfies
thread.title_full: Move Over, Kim K! Tokyo’s Littlest Off-White Fanatic Takes Stellar Selfies

author: Liana Satenstein
title: Move Over, Kim K! Tokyo’s Littlest Off-White Fanatic Takes Stellar Selfies
text:
Current location: Tokyo, Japan 
Occupation: Being young, taking elevator selfies, and loving Off-White 
Why you’ll like him: Pint-sized punk Yoshi is a celebrity within Tokyo’s streetwear scene. He’s often selfie-ing in customized leather jackets that would make Sid Vicious envious, slinking around in Vetements -esque shearling coats, and showing off his pants, which are usually covered in patches or have dad jean tendencies. His accessory game isn’t too shabby either: Yoshi has made a bold chain-lock choker his signature, but will sometimes switch it out with a highlighter yellow Off-White belt . In other words: Hook this kid up with a styling gig! 
He’s the king of the elevator selfie: Move over, Kim Kardashian West and Emily Ratajkowski ! Yoshi takes almost all of his photos in an elevator with seemingly claustrophobic proportions. But the yawn-worthy setting lends great contrast to his pieces, such as a pair of glinting silver pointy toe boots . 
Speaking of shoes . . . Yoshi may be the most confident kid on the planet: Do you know any other 13-year-old boys who can rock a pair of shiny go-go boots ? 
He’s the most popular boy on the block: Yoshi boasts quite the social circle: He gets his coif customized by Tokyo’s coolest hairstylist Haruka Hatakeyama . Also, he’s a mini heartthrob in the making , often flanked by local It girls like Yuki Sugimura and Lyla Iwamoto . 
Fun fact: He’s met idol Virgil Abloh of Off-White and has a pretty great picture to prove it.
